001/**  This controller provides functionality for the manager page after login
002 * @author Isha Virk
003 */
004package src.controller;
005
006import javafx.fxml.FXML;
007import javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent;
008import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
009
010public class manager_view_controller {
011
012    /**
013     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the menu items page 
014     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
015     */
016    @FXML
017    private void handle_menu_items_click(MouseEvent event)  {
018        useful_functions.switch_scene("GUI/menu_items_page.fxml", event);
019    }
020
021    /**
022     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the inventory page 
023     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
024     */
025    @FXML
026    private void handle_inventory_click(MouseEvent event) {
027        useful_functions.switch_scene("GUI/inventory_page.fxml", event);
028    }
029
030    /**
031     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the sales page
032     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
033     */
034    @FXML
035    private void handle_sales_click(MouseEvent event) {
036        useful_functions.switch_scene("GUI/sales_page.fxml", event);
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the order page
041     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
042     */
043    @FXML
044    private void handle_take_order(ActionEvent event) {
045        useful_functions.switch_scene("GUI/order_page.fxml", event);
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * This function handles the button click action to switch to the employee page
050     * @param event - Input trigger for the function to be called
051     */
052    @FXML
053    private void handle_employee_data(ActionEvent event) {
054        useful_functions.switch_scene("GUI/employee_data.fxml", event);
055    }
056
057}
